City of Crane Mayor
===================

[(432) 558-3563](tel:+14325583563)

[Send Email](mailto:mcadena@crane.texas.gov)

Mayor: Manuel Cadena, Jr.

![](https://crane.texas.gov/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/Council_ManuelCadena.jpg "Council_ManuelCadena")

City of Crane Mayor - Manuel Cadena, Jr.
----------------------------------------

Manuel  Cadena, Jr. has held the position of Mayor for the City of Crane beginning May 8, 2023.  Previously, he served as Councilman Ward #2 from April 1984 – May 1995 and            May 2002 – May 2023.
